entities.name: The great outdoors
entities.description: You awaken laying in a thick patch of grass. The blades are still moist from the dew this morning. Ahead of you lies a castle, while to your sides there is nothing but thick woods. I suppose forwards(dor001) is the only way to go.

entities.name: Main Hall
entities.description: Immediately, you step into the main hall. From the outer appearance, the castle looked normal, but thereâ€™s a weird atmosphere here. The inside of the castle is solemn, as if the color had been sucked right out of the walls.

entities.name: Treasure room
entities.description: 4 candles light up the room. Inside, you find there are two meticulously decorated chests trimmed with what seems to be gold. The king must be mighty wealthy.
